r.s: Polyfill of WeakMap/WeakReference for older PHP versions. This is a fork of the abandoned "weakref" PECL.
r.d: A weak reference provides a gateway to an object without preventing that object from being collected by the garbage collector (GC).
r.n: - Fix windows build issues. - Stop using the nonstandard `ulong` type. - Fix typo in PECL conflicts section with weakref PECL. - Change configure flag to enable/disable this extension to --enable-weakreference_bc
